name: p5.grain
description: p5.grain is a p5.js addon for conveniently adding grain and texture overlays to artworks.
author: meezwhite

scripts.build:darwin: npm run build-min:darwin; npm run build-core:darwin; npm run dist-core:darwin
scripts.build-core:darwin: mkdir -p dist; sed '/@internal/,/@end/d' p5.grain.js > p5.grain.core.js; minify p5.grain.core.js > dist/p5.grain.core.js; cp LICENSE dist/p5.grain.core.js.LICENSE.txt; rm p5.grain.core.js
scripts.build-min:darwin: mkdir -p dist; minify p5.grain.js > dist/p5.grain.min.js; cp LICENSE dist/p5.grain.min.js.LICENSE.txt
scripts.dist-core:darwin: echo examples/*/lib/ | xargs -n 1 cp dist/p5.grain.core.js dist/p5.grain.core.js.LICENSE.txt
